meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Poland.
meanings.sent1: In Poland, you can buy many things with zloties.
meanings.sent2: She exchanged her euros for zloties at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was filled with shiny zloties.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was worth more than all the zloties in the world.
meanings.sent5: The zloties jingled in his pocket as he walked.

meanings.definition: A plural form of the currency zloty.
meanings.sent1: He counted the zloties in his wallet before going shopping.
meanings.sent2: The price of the book was ten zloties.
meanings.sent3: The kids saved their zloties to buy ice cream.
meanings.sent4: The zloties clinked together as they were dropped into the donation box.
meanings.sent5: She received a handful of zloties as change from the cashier.
